actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide further for uniform annual observances of certain legal public holidays on Monday.

summary.text: Makes American Business Day a legal public holiday to be observed on the last Monday in April. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 6103(a) ).

titles.title: A bill to provide further for uniform annual observances of certain legal public holidays on Monday.
